title: PID field across protocol, pi-socket, and hypivisor
summary: Added PID field across protocol, pi-socket, and hypivisor. Implemented pid?: number in NodeInfo interface, pid: process.pid in register RPC params, pid: Option<u32> in Rust struct with serde skip_serializing_if, and updated 7 test helpers (handlers.rs + cleanup.rs). All builds and tests pass.

tests: pi-socket npm run build && npm test (80 tests pass)
hypivisor cargo test (109 tests pass) && cargo build
